<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of button images or names assigned to the given user action. A maximum of maxKeys keys is listed. You can find the action names in config class ControllerSchemes or [[:Category:Key Actions|user action names]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  [[Structured Text]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''actionKeysImages''' userAction </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> userAction: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Structured Text]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[Structured Text]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''actionKeysImages''' [userAction, maxKeys] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [userAction, maxKeys]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> userAction: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> maxKeys: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Structured Text]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_text = actionKeysImages "ReloadMagazine"</inner><close></pre></close></ext> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_reload = actionKeysImages ["ReloadMagazine",1]</inner><close></pre></close></ext>will return '''"R"''' (incl. the quotation marks!) </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
